price: 34. Nummah Nabii Suleymaan mokkorreeh, rabe seehadaytih garab (kay agabuk tiyak teyna xalte galaloh garab kinnuk) korsil kaak qidne. Tohuk lakal Yallal yuduureeh yotoobe.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا عَلَىٰ كُرۡسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدٗا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā sulaymāna wa-alqaynā ʿalā kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anāba
